display_long_description:
# Browser - Video Player - Gaming Hub - Smart Tv - Screen Sharing

You can have **windows** all around you or play your favorite game solo or stream it to friends in a personal home theater. It runs entirely on your headset. **No PC required.**

* 📺 **Smart TV** Perfect for watching streaming services or **local video** files with **light fx*. **Note**: Netflix is not supported.
[media]
* ▶️ **Play local video files** saved on your headset, including 3D SBS video. (MKV and MP4 supported, ISO and MVC not supported)
* 🎮 Use a **Gamepad** to play Xbox Cloud Gaming, GeForce Now & other online games (gamepad tracking only for Xbox/PS5 controller)
[media]
* 🛜 **Screen Sharing** tabs + video files in private rooms from headset to headset (no pc needed)
* 👥 **Join rooms** to collaborate or watch videos together on shared screens.
* 🏞️ Beautiful **virtual environments** or full mixed-reality experience 
* 💻 **Apps and webpages** can be placed anywhere around you in 3D space. 
[media]
* 🖥️ **Fluid Link**, our (experimental & paid) PC streaming add on.
* 🖱️ Wireless **Mouse & Keyboard** support for maximum productivity 
* ⌨️ **International Keyboard Layouts**: Supports multiple languages 

👋 This app is in Early Access and is actively being developed. Please let us know about any bugs you encounter via the in-app help chat or our discord.
